com.giift.sdk.data

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giift.sdk.data.Location
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.provider.BaseColumns

    public abstract class Location
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.provider.BaseColumns
    Wrapper around a retailer's locations (shops). This class helps accessing the corresponding data stored in the GiiftProvider

      • GetMapUri

        @Nullable
public static android.net.Uri GetMapUri(android.content.Context context,
                                                  @NonNull
                                                  java.lang.String retailerId)
        When a retailer has locations, the server should provide a picture of a map with the different markers for all the locations. This method provides the url of this picture based on the retailer id.
        Parameters:
        context - used to access the base url of the server
        retailerId - id of the retailer
        Returns:
        http url, where the picture of the map should be

      • GetCountryMapUri

        @Nullable
public static android.net.Uri GetCountryMapUri(@NonNull
                                                         android.content.Context context,
                                                         @NonNull
                                                         java.lang.String countryCode)
        For retailer without specific locations, the server provides the picture of the map of each country. This method helps to build the url of those picture.
        Parameters:
        context - used to access the server base url
        countryCode - iso code of the country. (e.g: FR, US, SG). Note, use "eur" for europe and "int" for a world map.
        Returns:
        http url of the picture on the server

      • UpdateDistToLocationAsync

        public static void UpdateDistToLocationAsync(@NonNull
                                             android.content.Context context,
                                             java.lang.String retailerId)
